author: coindesk.com
title: Bitcoin Climbs Above $110K, 'At Crossroads' for Next Major Move
description:
Bitcoin's BTC quiet climb on Monday accelerated to its strongest price in June, rebounding from last week's decline to near all-time high levels.
The largest crypto advanced by 3.7% over the past 24 hours, topping $110,000, and it's changing hands by only 2% …
